name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Frontend Engineer, I leverage over 9 years of experience in developing dynamic web applications using **React**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. I possess extensive expertise in state management with **Redux**, ensuring seamless UI interactions. Additionally, I apply best practices in code quality through tools like **ESLint** and **Prettier**. My experience with **Selenium** for end-to-end testing and implementing **MicroFrontend** architecture exemplifies my commitment to building scalable solutions. I have a proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior engineers, and successfully delivering high-impact projects that prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation. Currently, I’m focused on enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence in everything I do.
